import React, { useCallback } from 'react' import { Form, Input, Button } from 'antd' import Link from 'next/link' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { useInput } from '../pages/signup' import { loginAction } from '../reducers/user' const LoginForm = () => { const [id, onChangeId] = useInput('') const [password, onChangePassword] = useInput('') const dispatch = useDispatch() const onSubmitForm = useCallback((e) => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(loginAction) }, [id, password]) return (


) } export default LoginForm
